snippet: A Colorado county has agreed to pay $30,000 to a female victim of domestic violence who was jailed for three days at the request of U.S. immigration authorities even after a judge ordered her released, a civil rights group said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Colorado Domestic Violence Victim Gets Payout Over Immigration Hold
headline.main: Colorado Domestic Violence Victim Gets Payout Over Immigration Hold

lead_paragraph: A Colorado county has agreed to pay $30,000 to a female victim of domestic violence who was jailed for three days at the request of U.S. immigration authorities even after a judge ordered her released, a civil rights group said on Thursday.
